title.description: Label to show on the control (fixed text)

title=.description: Expression returning label to show on the control

dataSource.description: Fixed table's data. Each element's key maps to a column

dataSource=.description: Expression returning the dynamic data source. It must evaluate to an array of objects, whose keys map to columns.

colKeys.description: Order list of column keys (each maps to a property of the row element).

colHeaders.description: Order list of column headers (if omitted the key is used as header).

pageSizes.description: If set, the table has paging footer, with multiple options of page sizes

filterBy.description:
Allow filtering by the content of the listed columns (provided as array of keys).
If not set, filter field is not present. If empty array, all columns are used

disableSort.description:
Disable sorting for the listed columns (provided as array of keys)
If not set or false, all columns allow sorting. If `true`, sorting is disabled for all columns

colTransform.description:
Expression to apply to each column's data
The following local variables are available in the expression's context:

colFormat.description:
Format to apply to each column's data for rendering
It must be a valid *Angular* format pipe string

actions.description: Adds a menu in each row with fixed actions

action.description: Expression to evaluate when the actions is selected

actionsHeader.description: Label to show on the actions column
